translation.en: [teenage girl] "It began as a prank and ended in murder."
Thank you for shopping at B. Dalton's.
translation.zh: 谢谢您在B达顿书店购物

translation.en: The Shadyside Mall is now closed.
The Shadyside Mall is now closed.
Hello, this is B. Dalton's. We're closed.
translation.zh: 你好 B达顿书店 我们已经打烊了

translation.en: OK, since when do you work late?
translation.zh: 好吧 你什么时候开始 工作到那么晚了？

translation.en: Since my mom used her last paycheck on scratch tickets instead of the gas bill.
translation.zh: 从我妈把工资拿去买彩票 而不是付燃气费开始

translation.en: I do need a ride tonight.
And, yes, I don't want to walk home alone.
translation.zh: 不过对 我不想一个人走回家

translation.en: Fine. Just give me and, uh… Jasmine here 15 minutes to close up.
translation.zh: 好啊 给我和贾思敏 15分钟时间关个门

translation.en: Yeah, I thought, uh… "Big Tits" was kind of deflating her ego.
translation.zh: 对 我觉得“大奶头”有点损它尊严
我什么都没说 小怪咖
很好 很有趣 混球
我被吓到了 行了吧？你赢了

translation.en: Hi, um… I'm in the Shadyside Mall.
translation.zh: 嗨 我在荫城购物商场

translation.en: Ma'am, if you don't answer, I'm gonna dispatch help.
translation.zh: 女士 若您不回答 我会立刻派遣救援人员
森尼韦尔连续30年无暴力犯罪

translation.en: while Sunnyvale enters its 30th year with no violent crime.
[female reporter 2] Killer Capital, USA, as tragedy struck again.
translation.zh: 美国的杀手之都 悲剧席卷重来

translation.en: [male sports announcer] Sunnyvale football wins again!
translation.zh: 森尼韦尔足球队再创胜绩

translation.en: [female reporter 3] Christina Marlow and Jessica Van were found in a house in a residential area near Shadyside.
translation.zh: 克里斯汀那马洛和杰西卡凡 在荫城附近的房中被发现

translation.en: [man 1] Shadysiders seem to have no desire to better themselves.
translation.zh: 荫城人似乎并没有变好的欲望

translation.en: More body parts found in the lake between Shadyside and Sunnyvale.
translation.zh: 位处荫城和森尼韦尔 之间湖泊惊现更多尸块

translation.en: [male announcer 1] Sunnyvale voted Most Beautiful Place to Live!
translation.zh: 森尼韦尔被选为最美丽的居住地

translation.en: [male reporter 2] Shadyside residents are spending another night hunkering down in darkness as…
translation.zh: 荫城居民又度过了黑暗的一夜…

translation.en: [male announcer 2] Find your new home in Sunnyvale,
translation.zh: 来森尼韦尔寻找新生活

translation.en: where the sun always shines, even when it's cloudy!
translation.zh: 让阳光洒满你的人生 即使在乌云密布之中

translation.en: While the depression hit Shadyside hard,
translation.zh: 荫城经济遭受重创之际

translation.en: the economy in Sunnyvale continues to shine.
translation.zh: 森尼韦尔经济砥砺前行 越战越勇

translation.en: [female reporter 4] According to sources with the Shadyside Police…
translation.zh: 根据荫城警方信息… （联合报社）

translation.en: ♪ I'm only happy when it rains ♪
♪ You know I love it When the news is bad ♪ ♪ Why it feels so good to feel so sad? ♪
translation.zh: （亲爱的珊姆 真希望我们从未遇见）
荫城 美国的一个小镇

translation.en: But among locals, a history of horror has earned it another nickname,
translation.zh: 但曾在这片土地上发生的恐怖事件 却让它在当地居民间有了一个昵称

translation.en: -And last night, tragedy struck again. -Ugh, Dad!
translation.zh: -昨晚 悲剧席卷重来 -爸爸

translation.en: I'm here with Sheriff Nick Goode. Sheriff, what can you tell us?
translation.zh: 现在在我身旁的是郡治安官尼克古德 警长 您有什么要说的吗？

translation.en: [female reporter] Shadyside sits just beside Sunnyvale,
translation.zh: 荫城就坐落在森尼韦尔附近

translation.en: one of the safest and wealthiest communities in the country…
translation.zh: 而森尼韦尔是 美国最安全、富有的小镇…

translation.en: What is it about Shadyside? How do we end this cycle of violence?
translation.zh: 荫城接下来会如何？ 如何才能够终止这场暴力案件？

translation.en: -♪ I am a man who walks alone… ♪ -[keyboard clicking] ♪ And when I'm walking a dark road ♪
translation.zh: （在下沉默男爵 女王陛下 听候吩咐…）

translation.en: ♪ At night Or strolling through the park… ♪
♪ When the light begins to change ♪
translation.zh: （杀手戴着骷髅面具！） （对 在新闻上看到了 又一个荫城人“疯了”）

translation.en: ♪ I sometimes feel a little strange ♪ ♪ A little anxious when it's dark ♪
translation.zh: （对 在新闻上看到了 又一个荫城人“疯了”）

translation.en: -Dude! What the hell? -This isn't yours, dillweed!
translation.zh: -嘿 搞什么？ -这不是你的 小鬼

translation.en: Oh, I get it. You building a shrine or something?
translation.zh: 我知道了 你在搞什么圣地供奉吗？

translation.en: Alright, you know what? It's time for school. Get in the car.

translation.zh: 知道了 我先回完这段话

translation.en: Dad said you weren't allowed on this. Know how expensive AOL is?
translation.zh: 爸爸说过你不能再用这个了 你知道网有多贵吗？

translation.en: I'm stealing it. I'm talking to someone!
translation.zh: 我是偷偷在用 我在跟别人讲话

translation.en: This internet bullshit is exactly why you have no friends.
translation.zh: 这该死的玩意儿 就是你没有朋友的罪魁祸首

translation.en: It's not bullshit. It's a community dedicated to the truth.
translation.zh: 这不是什么该死的玩意儿 这是一个追寻真相的论坛

translation.en: Look, some guy went crazy and killed a bunch of people at the mall last night.
translation.zh: 你看 昨晚有个疯子 在商场杀了一堆人

translation.en: [Josh] It was all over the news.
translation.zh: 新闻上到处都是 （警察捕人记录薄 荫城商场案件）

translation.en: But, of course, the media won't talk about the most important part.
translation.zh: 当然媒体永远不会说最重要的部分

translation.en: [Deena] Josh, I am telling you calmly,
translation.zh: 乔希 我在很平静地跟你说

translation.en: step out of your internet fantasy nerd land and get in the car.
translation.zh: 从你的互联网梦幻 宅男世界里出来 去车上

translation.en: Step out your depressoid "I'm gonna die alone" land, and stop obsessing about Sam!
translation.zh: 那你从你郁郁寡欢“孤独终老”的 世界里出来 别再沉迷于珊姆了

translation.en: Up, up, down, down. Left, right, left, right, B, A, start.
translation.zh: 上 上 下 下 左 右 左 右 B A 开始

translation.en: You see? It's the witch. Sarah Fier's back.
translation.zh: 你看 是女巫 萨拉菲耶尔回来了
天啊 怎么你也这样？

translation.en: "She reaches from beyond the grave to make good men her wicked slaves!"
translation.zh: “她从坟墓伸出双手 让俊俏的男人变成她的俘虏”

translation.en: "She'll take your head. She'll follow you until you're dead!"
translation.zh: “她会揪下你的头 跟着你 直至你死去”

translation.en: What? The dude was wearing a Halloween skull mask!
translation.zh: 什么？那家伙戴着万圣节的骷髅面具
有人死了 希瑟死了

translation.en: The dude was probably just some sad sack who hated his life, like the rest of us,
translation.zh: 那人可能就是个憎恨自己人生的 可怜虫 就跟我们一样

translation.en: except he decided, "Hey, why don't I get out of here for good?"
translation.zh: 只不过他突发奇想 “为何我不永远离开这里？”

translation.en: And, "Hey, why don't I take Heather and a couple other mall rats with me?"
translation.zh: “不如再带希瑟 和商场里其他几个垃圾一起走“

translation.en: There's no angry dead witch who made him go postal.
translation.zh: 根本就不存在什么愤怒的女巫 控制他 让他发疯

translation.en: The only thing that made him go crazy is this town!
translation.zh: 唯一让他发疯的是这个小镇

translation.en: Seems like… maybe you got a little witch in you.
translation.zh: 看起来好像你有点女巫上身

translation.en: Dude, why are you even in here? This is the girls' bathroom.
translation.zh: 伙计 你为什么会在这里？ 这里可是女厕所

translation.en: You know we don't believe this witch shit, right?
translation.zh: 你知道我们不相信女巫的 对吧？

translation.en: It's just, like, fucked-up Santa Claus or something.
translation.zh: 不过就像是个疯子圣诞老人 诸如此类的

translation.en: -What's this? -I need you to give this to Sam tonight.
translation.zh: -这是什么？ -今晚帮我把这个给珊姆

translation.en: I am not getting mixed up in your ex drama. Do it yourself.
translation.zh: 我绝不要趟你跟前任的浑水 你自己去

translation.en: I'm not going to the game. I quit band.
translation.zh: 我不会去赛场的 我已经退出乐团了
-什么时候？ -从该死的某人那件事后

translation.en: Was band the only extracurricular you had left?
translation.zh: 乐团是你唯一退出的课余活动吗？

translation.en: You still have your band uniform, right?
You just wear that shit one last time.
I've got something that'll give you the balls to face Sam.
translation.zh: 我有东西可以给你勇气面对珊姆

translation.en: What? You're dealing again? I thought you stopped after this dingus's brother OD'd.
translation.zh: 什么？你又捣鼓毒品了？我以为 你在他兄弟用药过度后就停了

translation.en: Wh… Uh… Timmy wasn't a real OD.
translation.zh: 蒂米不算真的用药过度

translation.en: Which one of us is valedictorian, again?
translation.zh: 抱歉 是谁在毕业典礼上致辞来着？

translation.en: President of every club this shithole has to offer.
translation.zh: 垃圾俱乐部主席倾情奉上

translation.en: I'm getting out of here. Off to claim my place among the stars, bitch.
translation.zh: 我要走了 姐妹 得去优等生堆里绽放光芒了

translation.en: [boy] Woo! The witch lives! Long live Sarah Fier!
translation.zh: 女巫活着！萨拉菲耶尔万岁！

translation.en: out of respect for last night's tragic events,
translation.zh: 为向昨晚的悲剧致以沉重的哀悼

translation.en: Sunnyvale will host a candlelight vigil for the victims.
translation.zh: 森尼韦尔将 为受害者举行烛光守夜活动

translation.en: All player, cheer and band attendance is mandatory.
translation.zh: 所有参赛选手、拉拉队员 和乐团成员均强制参加

translation.en: ♪ I don't care if it hurts… ♪ [music fades]
[man 1 over speakers] This isn't how I wanted to be here tonight.
translation.zh: 我没想过 今晚我会以这种形式站在这里

translation.en: I wanted to be here as a fan.
translation.zh: 我曾设想自己以粉丝身份来到现场 （森尼韦尔恶魔队）

translation.en: Our Sunnyvale Devils and your Shadyside Witches
translation.zh: 看着我们森尼韦尔恶魔队和 你们的荫城女巫队

translation.en: throwing down some good old American football.
translation.zh: 在旧式美式足球赛场上挥洒汗水

translation.en: Instead I find myself here as a husband,

translation.zh: 更是以森尼韦尔镇长的身份站在这里

translation.en: And on behalf of all of the people in my town,
translation.zh: 代表森尼韦尔镇所有人民

translation.en: I say all of Sunnyvale mourns with you.
translation.zh: 向你们致以最沉重的哀悼

translation.en: Yeah, really looks like they give a damn.
translation.zh: 是啊 搞得跟真的似的

translation.en: The only Sunnyvalers who came were the ones who had to.
translation.zh: 森尼韦尔到场的人都是必须得来的人

translation.en: The football team and the cheerleaders.
[mayor] Our hearts are broken with grief.
I didn't think you were coming. I thought you quit band.
translation.zh: 我以为你不会来 我以为你退队了

translation.en: [man 2 over speakers] My family's been in Sunnyvale for generations,
translation.zh: 我的家族世世代代生活在森尼韦尔

translation.en: and now my brother is mayor and I your sheriff.
translation.zh: 现在我的兄弟是森尼韦尔镇长 我是郡治安官
我们在此过着优渥的生活

translation.en: And yet, I've seen you, our neighbors in Shadyside,
translation.zh: 但如今我们看到我们的邻居荫城

translation.en: It's easy in times like this to drown in questions of why…
there are no answers that will provide relief.
translation.zh: 任何答案都无法让我们放下沉重的心

translation.en: There's no peace found in the past.
You broke up with me! Remember? So stop acting like I'm the bad guy.
translation.zh: 是你跟我分手的 记得吗？ 不要搞得我是恶人一样

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm not the one who moved to Sunnyvale.
translation.zh: 又不是我搬来森尼韦尔的

translation.en: OK, you made the choice. I just made it official.
translation.zh: 是你做出了选择 我只是帮你说出来了而已

translation.en: You just couldn't wait to start your new fake life with your fake-ass mom!
translation.zh: 你不过是迫不及待要跟你那 恶心的继母开始虚假的新生活罢了

translation.en: I am half an hour away.
translation.zh: 我们只隔了一个半小时的车程

translation.en: It might as well be the goddamn moon, and you know it.
translation.zh: 也有可能是因为那该死的月亮 你知道的

translation.en: I know you were always too afraid to tell anyone about us.
translation.zh: 我知道你一直不敢跟别人说我们的事

translation.en: And I know that douchebag out there was squeezing your ass.
translation.zh: 我还知道那个渣男在外面揉你屁股

translation.en: -You broke up with me. -What's his name?
-You broke up with me! -What's his name, Sam?
translation.zh: -是你跟我分手的 -他叫什么 珊姆？

translation.en: We must not fall into darkness.
translation.zh: 我们不能跌入黑暗的深渊

translation.en: We must look to the light.
[scoffs] Yeah! What we should do is light a fuse
translation.zh: 对 我们就应该点燃火药线

translation.en: -You don't get it! -[Deena] No, no. I do.
There's not much of a future in Shadyside with a lesbo.
translation.zh: 荫城的同性恋没什么好未来

translation.en: Dead on the mall floor after a double shift,
translation.zh: 变成商场地板上的两具尸体

translation.en: or maybe, maybe if you're really lucky, you're the one carrying the knife.
translation.zh: 或你很走运的话 你就是那个拿刀的人

translation.en: I said it ain't a tragedy when it happens every week.
translation.zh: 每周都发生的事根本就不是什么悲剧

translation.en: -"Welcome to the suck!" "Shit is doomed!" -Shit is doomed!
translation.zh: -“我们没有未来 注定悲剧“ -就是注定悲剧

translation.en: -It's like you want to lose. -At least I know who I am.
translation.zh: -是你搞得想悲剧一样 -至少我知道我是谁

translation.en: Stop being mad at me for wanting a different future.
translation.zh: 别因为你自己看不到不同的未来 就迁怒于我

translation.en: It's not your future if you're pretending to be someone else.
translation.zh: 如果你假装成另一个人 那就不是你的未来
你再说一遍 狗娘养的

translation.en: You little green prick! Come here, you little bitch! Come here!
translation.zh: 你这个孬种 给我过来 混蛋

translation.en: -They think they can do what they want! -[all] No!
translation.zh: -他们以为他们能为所欲为 -不可以！

translation.en: [Kate] They ruin our vigil, then go waltzing back to their mansions,
translation.zh: 他们毁了我们的守夜 然后舒舒服服地回公寓躺着

translation.en: like we're some reject pile that they can step on!
translation.zh: 仿佛我们是任他们践踏的垃圾

translation.en: Well, we are not the reject pile!

translation.zh: -不是！ -今晚就是那些混蛋的忌日

translation.en: We're gonna go kill those preppy assholes!
[shouting] When I say Shady, you say side!
When I say Shady, you say side!
[Simon] When I say Shady, you say side!
-You gotta be kidding me. -Hey, isn't that, uh…
[boy] Where are you going, you pussies?
translation.zh: 你们要去哪 小野猫们？

translation.en: -[Sam] Peter, stop! What are you doing? -[Peter] Chill out!
translation.zh: -彼得 住手 你在干吗？ -放轻松

translation.en: This is definitely a good idea, right? Deena?
translation.zh: 这样做没事吧 蒂娜？

translation.en: [Peter] Sam! What… what are you doing?
Stay away from her, you bull dyke freak!
translation.zh: 离她远点 你个怪胎
珊姆 是我 我来了

translation.en: [Kate] OK, we should not be down here.
-Shut up, help me carry her! -We need to leave, like ten minutes ago.
translation.zh: -闭嘴 帮我扶她起来 -我们得离开这

translation.en: -We have to clear her airway. -Quit it!
translation.zh: -我们得保持她的呼吸道畅通 -住手

translation.en: Hey! I got this. Chill out.
translation.zh: 嘿 交给我 别紧张

translation.en: -How many fingers am I holding up? -Three.

translation.zh: 蒂娜约翰森？ 对 名字里有两个“E”
跟我说说刚才发生了什么？

translation.en: Well, it was driving behind the bus. Does that count as pursuing?
translation.zh: 他们开在我们巴士后面 这算追吗？

translation.en: The driver said that before the crash someone opened the emergency exit.
translation.zh: 司机说有人打开了紧急出口的门

translation.en: He also saw you with the cooler.
translation.zh: 他还说看到你拿着冰桶

translation.en: Maybe you were just, um… goofing around.
-Why don't you tell me what happened? -[Deena] I don't know.
translation.zh: 告诉我发生了什么 我不知道
我们的车失控了 先生

translation.en: Well, if you do think of anything,
My car is totaled. Well, Daddy will buy you a new one.
translation.zh: -我的车彻底报废了 -你爸会给你买辆新的

translation.en: Do it before Dad gets here, he's gonna murder you!
translation.zh: 那你最好在爸爸回来前宰 不然小心被他干掉

translation.en: You know the cops called him at work about some accident last night?
translation.zh: 你知道有人在他工作时间给他打电话 问昨晚的事故吗？

translation.en: Please get out of my room. You get out of your room. You've been in your bed all day!
translation.zh: -请你离开我的房间 -你已经在床上躺了一天了

translation.en: [female reporter] I'm here with Martin P. Franklin, Shadyside Mall Janitor.
translation.zh: 在我身边的是马丁P法兰克林 荫城商场的管理人

translation.en: -Martin, what do you know? -[Martin] He was a normal dude.
translation.zh: -马丁 你有什么信息？ -他是普通群众

translation.en: Always thought he would, like, just go home and read a comic book or whatever.
translation.zh: 别人对他的印象都是一个 回家看漫画书的普通男孩

translation.en: He was chill, just snapped I guess.
translation.zh: 他一直挺好的 可能就是突然崩溃了

translation.en: as mall employee Ryan Torres has been identified as the killer.
translation.zh: 商场员工莱恩托雷斯被锁定为凶手

translation.en: A recent graduate of Shadyside High
translation.zh: 该男子刚从荫城高中毕业不久

translation.en: an ordinary guy who, as those who knew him attest,
translation.zh: 据认识他的人称 该人极其普通
应该只是一时情绪崩溃

translation.en: Hi. Uh, Samantha Fraser's room, please?
translation.zh: 嗨 能帮我转接 萨曼莎弗雷泽的房间吗？

translation.en: -[woman] Hello? -[Deena] Uh… Hi, uh, Mrs. Fraser.
-I wanted to see how she was doing. -[Ms. Fraser] Deena?
translation.zh: -我只是想问问她怎么样了 -蒂娜？

translation.en: I was just w… worried about her and--
[Ms. Fraser] You won't stop until you've ruined her life completely, will you?
translation.zh: 你不彻底毁掉她的生活 就不会停手 对不对？

translation.en: -She's fine. Don't call here again. -[line goes dead]
translation.zh: 她没事 别再打来了

translation.en: See you got the full costume now!

translation.zh: 干吗？我也是有先后顺序的

translation.en: If you finish in an hour, I'll let you watch My So-Called Life with me.
translation.zh: 如果你们一个小时内装完 就让你们跟我一起看《我的青春期》

translation.en: And, uh, do not eat these.
These will make your little hearts stop, you'll choke to death on vomit
translation.zh: 这些药丸会让你们的心脏停跳 最后被噎死

translation.en: and everyone will be so, so super sad.
translation.zh: 这样所有人都会非常伤心的

translation.en: [man 1] Bob, easy with that blood. It's our last can!
translation.zh: 鲍勃 少倒点血 那是最后一桶了

translation.en: Lights and darks, and watch for stray socks.
translation.zh: 浅色和深色分开 再把袜子分出来

translation.en: -Remind me what's in it for me again? -Nope.
You still wearing the clothes from last night?
Did you wear that to the grocery store?
translation.zh: 你穿着它去的杂货店吗？

translation.en: I had to work a double shift and this was all I had in the car.
translation.zh: 我要去上班 车里只有这件衣服 所以对的
我要去上班 车里只有这件衣服 所以对的 我是穿的这件

translation.en: -[man 1 on TV] Alright, kiddo? -[man 2] There I was at ten…
translation.zh: -怎么样了 小鬼们？ -我分到了十…
带孩子 看窗外风景

translation.en: That prick Peter is screwing with me.
translation.zh: 彼得那个混蛋在骚扰我

translation.en: Yeah, he's creeping around our house in one of those skull masks. It's fucked.
translation.zh: 他戴着骷髅面具 在我房子周围转悠 见鬼了

translation.en: [sighs] I gotta go. Call you back.
translation.zh: 我先挂了 一会打给你

translation.en: What? Make up your mind, woman!
translation.zh: 什么？别变来变去的 女人

translation.en: -[whispering] Maybe this isn't a good id-- -Shh!

translation.zh: 嘿 混蛋 你在干吗…

translation.en: -[quietly] Are you crazy? -[Kate] It's just that Sunnyvale asshole.
translation.zh: -你疯了吗？ -他是那个森尼韦尔的混蛋

translation.en: Oh, no. I'm so happy to have the company.
translation.zh: 不客气 我也很高兴有人陪我

translation.en: -[Kate] You're a lifesaver, Mrs. Lane. -[Mrs. Lane] I used to be a nurse.
translation.zh: -你真的帮大忙了 雷恩女士 -我以前是护士

translation.en: Are you… you sure everything's OK?
Totally! I just have to run out and…
translation.zh: 是的 我只是得离开一下…
-杀了那个变态 -他为什么要闯进来？

translation.en: Why would he break in there? I just don't understand what he was doing.
translation.zh: -杀了那个变态 -他为什么要闯进来？ -我不懂他的行为 -他简直太恶心变态了

translation.en: He was acting all shifty and shit.
translation.zh: -我不懂他的行为 -他简直太恶心变态了

translation.en: You need to get some groceries, man.
translation.zh: 你应该买些零食了 伙计

translation.en: -We have an incredible sale at the store-- -He broke into the house! He had a knife!
translation.zh: -我们店现在有很大的折扣… -他闯进了房子 手里还有刀

translation.en: Whoa! With the kids there? That's wack!
translation.zh: 房里还有孩子？太恶劣了

translation.en: There were kids there. OK, and what?
translation.zh: 房里还有孩子 然后呢？

translation.en: He thinks because he's balling Sam,
translation.zh: 就因为他在跟珊姆上床

translation.en: he can come and prank us on our own turf.
translation.zh: 就能来我们地盘撒野吗？

translation.en: Hey, you know what? You're right. Fuck this.
translation.zh: 你说得对 让他见鬼去吧

translation.en: Don't forget the most important part. Fuck Sam.
translation.zh: 别忘了最重要的一部分 去他的珊姆

translation.en: Yeah, fuck her. She needs to get her psycho boyfriend in check.
translation.zh: 没错 去他的珊姆 她应该 送她的神经质男友去做检查
嘿 慢点 恋爱中的小鬼

translation.en: -Fill these out and take a seat. -No, I'm just visiting.
translation.zh: -坐下 把这个填了 -我是来探望的
探望时间在9点就结束了

translation.en: [clears throat] Tell Nurse Beddy she has a patient.
Beddy. Long time, how you been?
translation.zh: 贝蒂 好久不见 你好吗？

translation.en: -Still toting around with this moron. -She can't quit me, Beddy. Too pretty!
translation.zh: -还跟这蠢货混一起呢 -她离不开我 贝蒂 我太诱人了
听着 我们需要你的帮助

translation.en: I'm sure that you do, but there happens to be a new security protocol.
translation.zh: 我猜也是 但我们出了新安全条例

translation.en: We kept coming up short on blueberries and bananas.
translation.zh: 我们总是少蓝莓和香蕉

translation.en: -So now I need a special key-- -I need to see a patient.
translation.zh: -所以我需要特殊的钥匙… -我要见一个病人

translation.en: You want anything from the machine? I'm starving.
translation.zh: 你要买点什么吗？我饿死了

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -What do you think?
-What game? What are you talking about? -[Deena] About your dipshit boyfriend.
translation.zh: -玩什么？你在说什么？ -你那个蠢蛋男友

translation.en: -He threatened, "You're all fucking dead." -That didn't mean anything.
translation.zh: -他昨晚威胁要杀了我们 -那不代表什么

translation.en: Now tonight, he's stalking around, messing with us.
translation.zh: 然后今晚 他就阴魂不散 一直缠着我们

translation.en: He broke into the house where Kate was babysitting.
translation.zh: 他闯进了凯特在带孩子的那个房子

translation.en: You need to call him and tell him to back off.
translation.zh: 你立刻打给他 让他停手

translation.en: Good news. They're gonna transfer you out of this shithole tomorrow.
translation.zh: 好消息 他们明天就会把你转走
嘿 西蒙提款机 给我现金

translation.en: Don't look at me, dude. I'm… I'm… I'm broke.
translation.zh: 别看我 伙计 我都破产了

translation.en: [Sam] He has been with me all night!
translation.zh: 他一整晚都跟我在一起

translation.en: -Stop covering for him! He's a bad guy. -You're out of control!
translation.zh: -别掩护他了 他是个坏蛋 珊姆 -你失去理智了

translation.en: You put me in the hospital! Now you're here yelling at me--
translation.zh: 你害我进了医院 现在还来吼我

translation.en: OK. No, that was an accident. Look, I got a nosebleed.
translation.zh: 那只是意外 我当时流鼻血了

translation.en: -I didn't actually mean-- -A nosebleed? Stop making excuses!
So don't blame me when you wake up in ten years just like your dad!
translation.zh: 所以十年后 你变得跟你爸一样 醉熏熏一无是处的时候

translation.en: Old and drunk and going nowhere!
Second, yeah. Congrats on getting out of Shadyside, Sam.
translation.zh: 还有恭喜你离开荫城 珊姆

translation.en: All you had to do was suck it up, literally, and swallow some Sunnyvale--
translation.zh: 恭喜你操到了森尼韦尔人 你就含着…

translation.en: You know what? I never want to see you again!
Great. Have a nice goddamn life!
translation.zh: 好极了 祝你今后厄运连连

translation.en: -Where'd you learn how to do this? -Oh, a lot of people trade hacks online.
translation.zh: -你从哪里学到的？ -网上有很多人做黑客交易

translation.en: So, um… [chuckles] …when'd you get into the fruit business?
translation.zh: 所以你什么时候开始做水果生意的？

translation.en: Oh, that's just temporary. Saving up to get out of here.
translation.zh: 那只是暂时的 为了攒钱离开这里

translation.en: -Where are the keys? Do you have the keys? -No!
-[Deena whispers] No! -You can't wear that mask. What are--
translation.zh: -不 -你不能戴那个面具 你在…

translation.en: -[Simon] Come on! Let's go! -[Josh] Come on!
[female reporter] Mall employee Ryan Torres has been identified
as the killer in the mall massacre.
-[Simon] Deena! Hurry up! Let's go! -[Deena] Go! Go!
-[Simon] We have to go now! -[Deena] Hurry!
[Nick] You have access to the mall. You are still employed there, correct?
translation.zh: 你知道怎么进入商场 你依然是那的员工 对不对？

translation.en: I'mma tell you again. Somebody planted that.
translation.zh: 我再跟你说一遍 那是别人放的
你是对的 马丁 这些…

translation.en: Why would I tag my own place of work? Come on, man!
translation.zh: 我干吗标记我自己上班的地方？ 拜托 伙计

translation.en: Martin, around here, people show a little respect. They call me Sheriff Goode.
translation.zh: 马丁 这里的人都会对我有所尊重 他们称我“古迪警长”
去你妈的恶魔警长还差不多

translation.en: [Deena] I'm telling you, it was him!
The psycho killer my colleague shot dead, huh?
translation.zh: 我同事射杀的那个变态杀手？

translation.en: Yes! That's what we keep saying!
translation.zh: 对 这就是我们一直在说的
-你到底怎么回事？ -卡拼斯基警员

translation.en: You told me to come to you.
We should not be this close to the police station in a stolen ambulance.
translation.zh: 我们不应该离警察局那么近
越是大庭广众就越不容易暴露

translation.en: Ted Bundy, when he was stalking his victims, I mean.
translation.zh: 我说的是泰德邦迪 就跟他跟踪受害者时一样

translation.en: OK, didn't he get caught though?
-Well, no. Well, yeah, but-- -Figure this out. I'm gonna take a leak.
translation.zh: -没有 不… -你们慢慢争 我去上个厕所

translation.en: -[Josh sighs] -Why do you know so much about killers?
translation.zh: 你为什么那么了解那些杀手？

translation.en: -You hang onto any of that candy? -[Josh] Yeah.

translation.zh: 然后他的面具掉了下来

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, the mall killer, Ryan Torres.
translation.zh: 对 商场杀手莱恩托雷斯

translation.en: I know, but you guys must have made a mistake or something. Look…
translation.zh: 我知道 一定是你们哪里出错了 听着…

translation.en: Let me get the right paperwork.
Would you say he was more, uh, Dawn of the Dead
translation.zh: 你觉得他更像是《活死人黎明》

translation.en: or Night of the Living Dead? [Sam] Wait.
-You don't believe us? -This was a waste of time.
translation.zh: -你不相信我们？ -这就是浪费时间

translation.en: We've had prank calls, we've had reports of skeleton mask copycats all weekend.
translation.zh: 我们整个周末都在接收恶作剧电话 和骷髅面具模仿者的目击报告

translation.en: Got a call from the hospital. Lady sounded worked up.
translation.zh: 医院刚来了电话 那位女士听起来很激动

translation.en: Uh… wait, I'll… I got it. Take care of them.
translation.zh: 等下 我…我去 你照看一下她们

translation.en: [girl singing] ♪ You always hurt the one you love ♪
♪ The one you shouldn't hurt at all ♪
This is bullshit. There are bodies at the hospital. You're gonna see--
translation.zh: 不可理喻 医院里有尸体 你们会看到…

translation.en: Honey, we are so appreciative of this tip.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我们非常感谢你们提供的信息

translation.en: -The killer is still out there! -We'll do our damnedest to catch him.
translation.zh: -杀手还活着 -我们一定会竭尽全力抓捕他的

translation.en: You're a monster! You're supposed to protect us!
translation.zh: 你这个魔鬼 你应该保护我们的！

translation.en: Hey, hey! Young lady, do not test me!
translation.zh: 嘿 这位小姐 不要挑战我的极限

translation.en: [panting] I'm so sorry, sir. I have no idea what came over me.
translation.zh: 对不起 先生 我不知道我怎么了

translation.en: Go find your boyfriends! Tell them you need to relax!
translation.zh: 去你们的小男友身边 告诉他们你们需要冷静！

translation.en: Do… do you need help? What the…
translation.zh: 你没事吧？需要帮忙吗？ 什么…

translation.en: -[Simon screams] -[Sam] Deena, slow down! -[Sam] What are you doing? -[Deena] Just walk, fast.
translation.zh: -蒂娜 慢点 你干吗？ -快走

translation.en: I think we should stay. We're safe here. What if that psycho shows up again?
translation.zh: 我觉得我们不能走 我们在这里 是安全的 万一变态再次出现呢？

translation.en: -Then we'll be ready. -[Sam] What the hell?
Is that the cop's? You stole a cop's gun?
translation.zh: 这是那个警察的吗？ 你偷了警察的枪？

translation.en: -You out of your goddamn mind? -They didn't believe us.

translation.zh: 我们只能靠我们自己了

translation.en: -[Kate] Come on! -[Simon] Go! Go! Let's go!
[Sam] It doesn't make sense. It's… it's not possible.
-Who the hell was that? -How the hell should I know? She…
She was hot! I don't know! The bitch seemed normal!
translation.zh: 我只知道她很火辣 很正常一女人

translation.en: I hate to break it to you, but normal bitches don't bleed black fucking blood!
translation.zh: 抱歉打破你美梦了 但正常女人不会流黑血

translation.en: Well, she was hot and normal until she attacked me with a fucking razor blade!
translation.zh: 在她拿那把剃须刀攻击我前 就是很火辣也很正常啊

translation.en: Yeah, for like old-timey shaving, or in this case, I guess, slitting her--
translation.zh: 对 那种用来刮胡须的老式剃须刀 只是今天她是用它划…
手腕 她划了自己的手腕

translation.en: Was she singing a song, like an oldie… like an oldie song?
Jesus, Rain Man. How the fuck do you know that?
translation.zh: 天啊 你是雨人吗？你怎么知道的？

translation.en: -[Josh] The girl who attacked you. -[Simon] Holy shit!
translation.zh: -就是那个袭击你的女孩 -见鬼了

translation.en: She sang as she murdered her boyfriend,
translation.zh: 她就是唱着歌残杀她男友

translation.en: her friends, then she killed herself. Slashed her wrists.
translation.zh: 朋友 最后自杀的 割腕自杀

translation.en: Jesus. Yeah, why didn't I see this on the news?
translation.zh: 上帝啊 我为什么没看过这个新闻？

translation.en: Ruby is one of Shadyside's killers, just like Skull Mask.
translation.zh: 露比是荫城的杀手之一 就跟骷髅面具一样

translation.en: -[Josh] "Masked psycho murders kids at--" -[Kate] Camp Nightwing.
translation.zh: -“蒙面变态残杀孩子…” -夜行营地

translation.en: Yeah, my mom's sister was there.
translation.zh: 对 我妈妈的姐妹就在那

translation.en: That screwed my family up for a long time.
local milkman slashes a bunch of housewives.
translation.zh: 当地送奶人 残杀许多家庭主妇的案件

translation.en: 1904, Grifter guts girls, and on and on.
translation.zh: 1904年 剖取女孩内脏的杀手等等

translation.en: It happens in Shadyside over and over. Normal people turn into psychos.
translation.zh: 荫城接二连三发生恐怖事件 普通人变成变态杀人狂

translation.en: 1666. He was the first one recorded.
translation.zh: 1666年 他是第一宗案件制造者

translation.en: He, um… killed kids and cut out their eyes.
translation.zh: 他残杀孩童 挖出他们的眼睛

translation.en: -I always liked this sweater. -Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: -我一直很喜欢这件毛衣 -我知道

translation.en: If you get blood on it, I'll kill you.
translation.zh: 如果你把血沾到这上面 我就杀了你
我们为什么会变成这样？

translation.en: There are people trying to kill us.
Dead people, if you believe my weirdo brother.
translation.zh: 死人 如果你相信我那个怪胎弟弟说的话

translation.en: That's not what I meant. Yeah, I know.
Look, I know I always give you shit for pretending you're someone you're not,
translation.zh: 我总是把你想成你不是的样子 让你难堪

translation.en: It's not really easy for me to…
you know, be like us… either.
-Are you giving me a pass? -[chuckles] No.
Fine. I'm not gonna say what I was gonna say.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我不说我想说的话了

translation.en: I mean, here we are. We're together for one night and--
translation.zh: 我们就在一起一晚 然后…

translation.en: Dead people are trying to kill us.

translation.zh: 这些都不是随机发生的
是她在把荫城人变成杀手

translation.en: No one actually thinks that this witch shit is real.
translation.zh: 没人会相信存在什么女巫

translation.en: Yeah, it's something babysitters make up to scare kids.
translation.zh: 这是保姆想出来唬小孩的东西

translation.en: No, no. Just listen to me.
1666, Sarah Fier was hanged for witchcraft, fact.
translation.zh: 1666年 萨拉菲耶尔 因巫术被用绞刑是已知事实

translation.en: But ever since she was executed, she's been possessing people,
turning them into killers, to take revenge on the town.
translation.zh: 把他们变成杀手 报复荫城

translation.en: -[Simon] It's like the nursery rhyme. -[Josh] Yeah. Yeah.
[Simon] "Before the witch's final breath, she found a way to cheat her death."
translation.zh: “在女巫咽气前 她找到了逃生的办法

translation.en: "By cutting off her cursed hand, she kept her grip upon our land."
translation.zh: 她切断被诅咒的手 自始自终控制着我们的土地

translation.en: to make good men her wicked slaves."
translation.zh: 让俊俏的男人变成她的俘虏”

translation.en: Don't you see what's happening to us? This is all proof.
translation.zh: 再看看发生在我们身上的一切 都是证据啊

translation.en: Shadyside isn't just some hotbed for psychos.
translation.zh: 荫城不是孕育变态杀人狂的温床

translation.en: All these massacres are connected to Sarah Fier. The witch's curse is real!
translation.zh: 所有这些屠杀都跟萨拉菲耶尔有关 女巫的诅咒是真的

translation.en: Fine. Let's assume that the witch has been possessing people
translation.zh: 好 就假设是女巫占据人体

translation.en: for some sort of messed-up vendetta.
translation.zh: 因为某种乱七八糟的宿怨

translation.en: This isn't the same as the mall massacre. Something different is happening to us.
translation.zh: 但这跟商场的杀人事件不同 这件事不一样

translation.en: OK, we have two of her killers after us and both of them are dead.
translation.zh: 现在她有两个杀手在追杀我们 而且都是已经死了的杀手

translation.en: Why is she so mad at us?
translation.zh: 为什么她那么生我们的气？

translation.en: I don't know, you know. I thought I hit my head…
translation.zh: 我不知道 我以为我撞到了头

translation.en: I can't believe you're wearing that.
translation.zh: 难以相信你居然戴这个

translation.en: Can't believe you're above it, when we're in the middle of the fucking woods and dead maniacs are after us.
translation.zh: 我们要去树林里 身后还被僵尸杀手追杀

translation.en: OK, so I fell out of the car…
translation.zh: 好 我从车上摔了下来…

translation.en: This is bad! This is really bad!
No wonder the witch is pissed at us. I'd be pissed too. Sam disturbed her grave.
translation.zh: 难怪这女巫生我们气了 珊姆撞到了她的坟墓

translation.en: [sighs] Now she's sending her henchmen after us.
translation.zh: 所以她派了她的忠实追随者 来追杀我们

translation.en: As in every one of those sickos on your wall is coming after us?
translation.zh: 你墙上挂的那些变态 都会来追杀我们？

translation.en: [Simon] Hold up. Hold up. She's mad because we disturbed her grave, right?
translation.zh: 等等 她生气是因为 我们打扰了她的坟墓 对不对？

translation.en: Just put the bones back, rebury them, and put her to rest!
translation.zh: 把她的骨头放回去 重新埋好 让她安息
对《鬼驱人》就这么演的啊

translation.en: Whatever. Let's do it quickly so we can go.
translation.zh: 随便了 我们赶紧搞完 然后走

translation.en: Deena, Deena! Find something to wrap her bones!
translation.zh: -好 -蒂娜 找个东西包她的骨头

translation.en: I think there's someone in the woods!
translation.zh: 各位 我觉得林子里有人

translation.en: -That was the Camp Nightwing Killer! -That was a bust!
translation.zh: -那是夜行营地杀手 -根本就没用

translation.en: Yeah, maybe because it's not like the movies, OK?
It's not as easy as putting bones to rest!
translation.zh: 不是把骨头埋回去那么简单

translation.en: -It should've worked. It always works! -[Josh] Maybe it's her missing hand.
translation.zh: -应该有用才对 这总是有用的啊 -也许是她丢失的手

translation.en: Who gives a shit? It doesn't matter. Hey, how do I not die?
translation.zh: 谁他妈管啊？我怎样才能不死？

translation.en: [Simon] We! How do we not die! And I'm looking at you, witch nerd!
translation.zh: 我们！是我们怎样才能不死 我在问你 女巫宅男

translation.en: -I… I don't know! -They're not coming for us!
translation.zh: -我不知道 -他们不是冲我们来的

translation.en: -I saw her again… -[woman whispers] It's you.
The witch. She… I disturbed her grave.
translation.zh: 那个女巫 她…是打扰了她的坟墓

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, yeah. Nightwing ran right by me.
translation.zh: 对 夜行杀手直接从我身边跑过去了

translation.en: I jumped out his way, it was like he didn't even see me. He went for her.
translation.zh: 就跟没看见我一样 直接冲她去了
各位 不是的 露比攻击了西蒙

translation.en: Skull Mask came after us at home. And while you guys were babysitting!
translation.zh: 骷髅面具追到了我们家 还有你们照顾小孩的房子

translation.en: Skull Mask didn't care about us.
translation.zh: 骷髅面具根本不在乎我们
他想要的是这个 珊姆的血

translation.en: Yeah! From the crash when Sam puked period!
translation.zh: 对 这是车祸后珊姆吐的血

translation.en: It's Jaws, dude! A shark smelling blood!
translation.zh: 就跟《大白鲨》一样 伙计 鲨鱼会冲着血腥味去

translation.en: [panting] Kate's right! When we found Skeletor,
translation.zh: 凯特说得对 我们发现骷髅时

translation.en: he was all sniffy and weird with my shirt like a perv in a pantie shop!
translation.zh: 他跟个内裤小偷一样 在变态地闻我的T恤

translation.en: Yeah, but he came to our house too!
translation.zh: 对 但他也去我们家了

translation.en: [Simon] Sam bled on her bones, now the witch wants more of her blood!
translation.zh: 珊姆把血滴到了她骨头上 那个女巫想要更多她的血

translation.en: OK, so what do they do in Jaws?
translation.zh: 好了 《大白鲨》里 他们是怎么做的？

translation.en: They didn't go skinny-dipping with the goddamn bait. She's not bait!
translation.zh: -当然不是跟诱饵一起游泳 -她不是诱饵

translation.en: Seriously, if we're right and they're after her…
translation.zh: 我说真的 如果我们猜对了 他们真的在追她

translation.en: let's give these assholes what they want.
translation.zh: 就给那些混蛋他们想要的东西
动作快 我们要清除污渍

translation.en: You can't have any of Sam's blood on you. Well, not much I can do about that.
translation.zh: -你们身上不能有珊姆的血 -看来无需我的帮助

translation.en: Deena, you have to get clean too! Not a single drop, OK?
translation.zh: 蒂娜 你也要清理干净 一滴都不能有

translation.en: I don't want to go in by myself.
[whispering] Up, up, down, down. Left, right, left, right, B, A, start.
translation.zh: 上 上 下 下 左 右 左 右 B A 开始

translation.en: OK, well, fine or not, we s… still need to cover it.
translation.zh: 好吧 不管有没有事 还是要包扎一下

translation.en: [Kate] Do you really think this is going to work?
translation.zh: 你真的觉得这样有用吗？

translation.en: And, like, tonight's been the first time
I've felt like myself in… months.
translation.zh: 第一次觉得我是我自己

translation.en: I forgot what that… what that felt like.
translation.zh: 以至于我忘记做自己是什么感觉了

translation.en: -♪ Wouldn't turn around and break it… ♪ -[Kate] Make sure my back is clean.
translation.zh: 一定要把我的背擦干净

translation.en: -You're gonna have to look at me. -♪ And anyone who's ever played a part ♪
What if tonight's it for us?
Did you… all go to pound town?
translation.zh: 你们都去了温柔乡了吗？

translation.en: [Josh] The killers go to the blood.
Smile, you son of a bitch!
translation.zh: 微笑 你个狗娘养的

translation.en: Are you sure you want to do this?
See you on the other side.
[Ruby Lane singing] ♪ You always hurt the one you love ♪
♪ The one you shouldn't hurt at all ♪
Dude! She's here! I saw her!
translation.zh: 伙计 她来了 我看到她了！

translation.en: She was… She was so sexy, but fucking crazy still!
translation.zh: 她性感爆了 太他妈简直了

translation.en: She was doing it! Following the blood trails!
It's working. Skull Mask freak, three o'clock.
translation.zh: 起作用了 骷髅面具 3点整

translation.en: If this doesn't work, I will murder you!
translation.zh: 如果这没效果 我就宰了你
看你们还活得成不 混蛋们
-他们追过来了 -他们会一直追的

translation.en: No, no! We are not fucked!
She's fucked. They're coming for her.
translation.zh: 她才是 他们是来追她的

translation.en: If we put Sam in the hall, we end this now.
translation.zh: 如果我们把珊姆留在大厅 一切就都结束了

translation.en: A bullet won't stop them, fine.
translation.zh: 子弹阻止不了他们 没事

translation.en: But we just tried to goddamn explode them, and that didn't work!
translation.zh: 但我们刚炸了他们 依旧没用

translation.en: I mean, that's not exactly what she's saying.
You'd let us all die to protect her. Look at this.
translation.zh: 你这样只会让我们 都为了保护她而死 看看这些

translation.en: I don't want you guys to die for me.
translation.zh: 我不希望你们为我而死

translation.en: Let me go! Let me… Sam!
translation.zh: 放开我 放开 珊姆！

translation.en: [Deena] Let me go. Let me go!

translation.zh: （夜行营地大屠杀 幸存者C贝尔曼“我看到了女巫”）

translation.en: -[Sam] What… what… what is going on? -[Kate] You're not doing this alone.
translation.zh: -怎么回事？ -我们不会让你一个人面对的

translation.en: [Sam] Camp Nightwing. Summer of '78. Group of campers, brutal massacre.
translation.zh: 夜行营地 1978年的夏天 一群露营者被屠杀

translation.en: There was one Shadyside survivor, C. Berman.
translation.zh: 有一个荫城的幸存者 克莉丝汀贝尔曼

translation.en: "The still traumatized girl claims that amidst the carnage she saw the witch."
translation.zh: “仍未从阴影中走出来的少女 说她在屠杀过程中看到了女巫”

translation.en: Yeah, just like you. So, if she survived, I'm pretty sure--
translation.zh: 对 就跟你一样 所以如果她能活下来 那我相信…

translation.en: There may be a way for me to live too.
translation.zh: 我也可能有办法活下来

translation.en: [Kate] I got it! C. Berman! 9006 Brennan Way.
translation.zh: 找到了 “克莉丝汀贝尔曼 布伦难路9006号”
-没人接电话 -这里是贝尔曼家

translation.en: -I'm not home right now. -I need some help here!
-Please leave a message after the beep. -No one's there!
Hello, my name is Deena Johnson. I think you saw the witch.
translation.zh: 你好 我是蒂娜约翰森 你看到过女巫

translation.en: This shit is not gonna hold!
We need to know how you survived!
translation.zh: 我们想知道你是怎么活下来的

translation.en: Hey! We're being attacked, alright? There are killers here!
translation.zh: 我们正在被袭击 杀手在追杀我们！

translation.en: If you're there, please pick up! Please answer!
translation.zh: 如果你在家 请接电话

translation.en: -To record a new message, press one. -Fuck! No!
translation.zh: -录制新留言 请按“一” -操 不！

translation.en: What? No, she's alive. That's the whole point.
translation.zh: 什么？她活着啊 这才是关键

translation.en: Yeah, she… she survived, but… but first she died.
translation.zh: 对 她活下来了 但是在死了之后

translation.en: [Deena] "C. Berman was found in the woods."
translation.zh: “克莉丝汀贝尔曼在森林里被发现

translation.en: "Her heart had stopped but local boy performed CPR."
translation.zh: 她的心脏停跳 但当地男孩实施了心肺复苏术”

translation.en: What if that's how she survived? Her heart stopped.
translation.zh: 会不会她就是这样活下来的？ 心脏停跳
她通过死 活了下来

translation.en: What is it? The fucking rhyme. The fucking rhyme!
"She'll take your blood, she'll take your head!"
translation.zh: “她会吸光你的血 她会揪下你的头”
-“跟着你 直至…” -“直至你死去”

translation.en: -[pounding continues] -It's just like Kate said. OK?
And then, just like this C. Berman bitch, we bring you back to life.
translation.zh: 然后像克莉丝汀贝尔曼一样 再把你救回来

translation.en: Fuck it. I'm dying tonight one way or another.
translation.zh: 去他的吧 反正我今晚横竖都要死

translation.en: Let's try to bring me back.
A few months ago, my brother Timothy had an unfortunate experience
translation.zh: 几个月前 我兄弟蒂莫西 遭遇了一件不幸的事

translation.en: in which he ingested too much of a certain substance.
He was dead for two minutes.
translation.zh: 然后心脏停跳了两分钟

translation.en: You need to take these in order. Pile one takes the edge off.
translation.zh: 你必须按顺序服用 第一堆药会让你眩晕

translation.en: You're gonna feel like you're being fucked by a unicorn.
translation.zh: 你会觉得自己像是在被独角兽操一样

translation.en: Pile two is gonna bring your core temp way down.
translation.zh: 第二堆药会让你极度不适

translation.en: You need to take a five-minute interval between pile two and pile three.
translation.zh: 服用第二堆药后你要间隔五分钟 才能服用第三堆

translation.en: That's really important, OK? Pile three brings you down and out,
translation.zh: 这非常重要 第三堆药会让你进入死亡状态

translation.en: so take that "take five" or it's all gonna go to shit!
translation.zh: 所以一定要间隔五分钟 不然一切就都白费了

translation.en: -How many do we have? -Tons. Like a thousand.
translation.zh: -要多少支？ -要一堆 超级多
等等 拿肾上腺素笔干吗？

translation.en: This is what brings her back. This is Jesus!
translation.zh: 这是能救她回来的东西 是耶稣在世！

translation.en: Remember half an hour ago, when you wanted to murder me?
translation.zh: 还记得半个小时前 你们还想杀我吗？

translation.en: You don't have to do this. You can leave.
translation.zh: 你们不用这么做的 你们可以走

translation.en: Remember when you decided to sacrifice yourself for us?
translation.zh: 还记得你刚才想为我们牺牲自己吗？

translation.en: OK, I got stock room. You take the emergency exit.
translation.zh: 好 我去储藏室 你去紧急出口

translation.en: Whoa! No, no, no! Splitting up is not a good idea at all.
translation.zh: 不行 我们不能分开

translation.en: But, dude, listen to me. I know that this is all fucked,
translation.zh: 伙计 听我说 我知道这很可怕

translation.en: She doesn't have time for most people.
translation.zh: 对大部分人都没那么多耐心

translation.en: She's being nice because we're probably gonna die.
translation.zh: 她只是很善良 因为我们可能会死

translation.en: No! OK, well… maybe we're gonna die,
translation.zh: 不是的 好吧 我们是可能会死
她在你身上看到了某些东西
-所以呢？ -所以你也要发现自己 伙计

translation.en: We would not be this far if it weren't for you.
translation.zh: 如果不是你 我们根本走不到这一步

translation.en: Now we have to keep those psychos away from Sam.
translation.zh: 现在我们要让那些变态远离珊姆
所以去吧 像个男人一样

translation.en: What if we fuck up and just kill me?
translation.zh: 如果我们搞砸了 我就这么死了呢？

translation.en: What if you can't bring me back? [sniffles]
translation.zh: 如果你们没办法救我回来呢？

translation.en: My whole future, my whole life in Shadyside.
translation.zh: 我的整个未来 我在荫城的一生

translation.en: A night shift, a day shift,
and a million empty beer cans,
But tonight, even though we are in hell,
translation.zh: 但今晚 即使我们身处地狱

translation.en: I feel like I have another chance with you.
translation.zh: 但我却在你身上看到了我的未来

translation.en: And I'm not gonna lose you again.
translation.zh: 我绝不会再让自己失去你

translation.en: When this is all over, I am gonna take you on a date.
translation.zh: 等这一切结束 我就带你去约会

translation.en: We're going to eat cheeseburgers and listen to the Pixies,
translation.zh: 我们要去吃芝士汉堡 听摇滚音乐

translation.en: and make out and have the best night of our goddamn lives.
translation.zh: 做爱 度过最美好的夜晚

translation.en: But right now, you've got to die.
translation.zh: 但现在 你必须得死

translation.en: Now, look at me. Look at me.
I am going to bring you back.
-It's OK. It's OK. -[crying] I'm so sorry.
[Sam] I need to die. I need to die.
[Deena] Do it! Do it! Do it! Come on!

translation.zh: 快走 她就在我后面

translation.en: Josh, Josh! Come help me! Get the pens!
translation.zh: 乔希 快来帮我！拿笔来

translation.en: Help me! Go get the EpiPens!
translation.zh: 快帮我 拿肾上腺素笔来

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know.
It has to work! It has to.
I will not let you do this.
[grunting] Come on, Sam. Come on. Come on, Sam!
translation.zh: 醒醒 珊姆 醒醒
以下为对蒂娜约翰森的询问
能跟我说说发生了什么吗？

translation.en: We were picking up Sam's prescription.
And the lights went out. It was pitch black.
translation.zh: 然后灯突然灭了 周围一片漆黑

translation.en: We hid until it was over.
[Nick] You had 15 stitches in your shoulder.
Sam, you look like a ghost. Like you just came back from the dead.
translation.zh: 珊姆 你看起来跟鬼一样 就好像刚从鬼门关回来

translation.en: I'll tell you what the facts tell me.
translation.zh: 我跟你说说我是怎么看的吧

translation.en: They're to blame for everything. That feels too easy to me.
translation.zh: 就我看来 他们是一切的根源

translation.en: But that's the story this department will go with
translation.zh: 但警局会怎么判断这件事

translation.en: unless you can help me to see it differently.
translation.zh: 取决于你怎么帮助我重新解读这件事

translation.en: An underprivileged overachiever with bright prospects.
translation.zh: 一个有着光明前途的底层优等生

translation.en: A guy who's been supporting his family alone since he was 15.
translation.zh: 一个从15岁起就孤身 撑起整个家庭的男孩

translation.en: Both succumbing to the quick cash of drugs.
translation.zh: 双双屈服于具有快速生钱之道的毒品
很适合旁白 是不是？

translation.en: [Nick] You came here for my help. I should have listened to you. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 你来寻求我的帮助 我应该好好听你说的 对不起

translation.en: But there's nothing else to say.
translation.zh: 但已经没什么好说的了

translation.en: Do you want your friends going down for this?
translation.zh: 你希望你朋友为此蒙冤吗？

translation.en: So I'm a bad guy because I'm in here.
translation.zh: 因为我在这里 所以我是坏人

translation.en: Then that makes you a bad guy, too, little man.
translation.zh: 那你也是坏人 小矮子
如果你想起任何事 给我打电话
伙计 你又不是我爸
荫城再次发生死亡案件

translation.en: A drug-fueled night of violence leaves a trail of bodies.
translation.zh: 在一个放纵的毒品之夜后 药店赫然出现尸体
梅丽莎 跟我们说下案件吧

translation.en: [female reporter 2] There are three dead at East Union Medical…
translation.zh: 东联医院出现了三具尸体…

translation.en: I wanted to give you this the other day.
But you don't have to open it right now.
Yeah, it's not a big deal. Just some pizza.
translation.zh: 是啊 没什么大不了的 一点披萨而已

translation.en: Alright. Listen, asshole. Don't call here--
translation.zh: 好了 听着 混蛋 别再打过来…

translation.en: -[whispering voice echoes] Sam… -[woman] You called me.
Wanted to know how I survived the Camp Nightwing Massacre.
translation.zh: 想问我怎么从夜行露营屠杀里 活下来的

translation.en: [C. Berman] Did you touch the bones? Did you see her face?
translation.zh: 你摸到她的骨头了吗？ 你看到她的脸了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but, uh… thanks for your prompt reply.
translation.zh: 对 但还是谢谢你回我电话

translation.en: -[C. Berman] It's not over. -[whispering voice] Sam…
[C. Berman] But you haven't stopped her.
[C. Berman] She'll do whatever it takes.
♪ And gave it to the rich, yeah ♪
♪ And let the martyrs stretch, yeah ♪
translation.zh: （发生了很多事） （我知道 你看到了吗？ 瘾君子在医院 杂货店进行了大屠杀）

translation.en: ♪ Singing one more time around Might do it ♪
translation.zh: 瘾君子在医院 杂货店进行了大屠杀） （可以确定 这次不是萨拉菲耶尔
（可以确定 这次不是萨拉菲耶尔 是两个瘾君子 凯特和西蒙）
（不是 那是个骗局 他们不是瘾君子）

translation.en: We have to get her back.
I'm going to get you back.
I thought there was a way to end it.
translation.zh: 我以为总有办法终结它

translation.en: ["School's Out" playing] ♪ School's out for summer… ♪
